sellerCard.description: I‚Äôm Enock, a Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in the tech field. My expertise includes WordPress, React, Vite, Next.js, Express, PHP, Convex, and custom web development. I specialize in building responsive, high-performance websites, UI/UX design, API development, plugin customization, and website optimization. Whether you need a brand-new site, redesign, or plugin development, I‚Äôm here to help bring your ideas to life with top-quality solutions.

description.content:
Hello There!


Looking to create a personalized LMS that fits your unique needs? Whether you're managing a coaching center, a school, or a university, I specialize in building custom e-learning platforms that help you deliver courses, engage students, and manage your institution all in one place.


What Youll Get:

  • Fully Customized LMS: Tailored to your specific needs.
  • Mobile-Responsive Design: Access your LMS on any device.
  • Course Management: Add, organize, and track courses.
  • Payment Gateway Integration: Secure PayPal, Stripe, and more.
  • Flexible User Roles: Admin, Teacher, and Student roles.
  • Live Sessions: Zoom/Google Meet integration for real-time classes.
  • Tracking & Reporting: Detailed student progress and course analytics.
  • Marketing Automation: Automated emails and campaigns.


Custom Features? I've Got You Covered!


Have specific needs? I'm happy to accommodate custom features, from eLearning tools to unique integrations. Just let me know what you have in mind, and well make it happen!


Ready to bring your e-learning vision to life? Lets get started!
